content: st *double_crochet in the next st the second double_crochet in the pair below and in the chain-1 space chain 1 skip 1 repeat from * across until 16 pairs of double_crochet are worked don t work a chain 1 after the last pair double_crochet in the last st turn row 7 to 21 repeat row 5 and 6 with one less pair of double_crochet in each row row 21 will have only one pair of double_crochet with a double_crochet on each side with right side facing work 2 single_crochet in the edge of each double_crochet row down the left-hand side one single_crochet in the edge of the two single_crochet row 2 single_crochet in the edge of the last double_crochet row and 3 single_crochet in the edge of the scalloped row work 40 chains to form a tie bind off still with right side facing work 40 chains and reverse the single_crochet edging working up the right-hand side of the bandana work 2 or 3 more single_crochet across the pointed end and join to first single_crochet bind off and work in ends
